column2: Position Title:  PPC Executive Location:  Gurgaon Job Type:  Full-time Department:  Marketing Job Summary: As a PPC Executive, you will be responsible for planning, implementing, and managing pay-per-click (PPC) campaigns across various platforms. You will work closely with the marketing team to optimize and improve campaign performance, drive traffic, and achieve business objectives. Key Responsibilities: 1.Campaign Planning and Setup: Conduct keyword research to identify potential keywords and phrases for campaign targeting. Develop and implement PPC strategies for various platforms, such as Google Ads, Bing Ads, and social media channels. Create and set up PPC campaigns, ad groups, and ad copies. 2.Campaign Monitoring and Optimization: Monitor and analyze campaign performance, adjusting bids, budgets, and targeting parameters to achieve optimal results. Conduct A/B testing to refine ad copies and landing pages for improved conversion rates. Implement and manage remarketing campaigns to maximize user engagement. 3.Keyword Management: Regularly update and optimize keyword lists based on performance and relevance. Perform competitor analysis to identify new opportunities and trends in the industry. 4.Budget Management: Manage daily and monthly budgets, ensuring efficient allocation of resources. Provide budget recommendations based on performance data and business goals. 5.Reporting and Analysis: Generate and present regular reports on campaign performance, highlighting key metrics and insights. Utilize analytics tools to assess the impact of PPC efforts on overall marketing goals. 6.Collaboration: Work closely with the content, design, and development teams to ensure ad creatives and landing pages are optimized for conversions. Collaborate with other marketing team members to align PPC strategies with broader marketing initiatives. Qualifications and Skills: Bachelor's degree in Marketing, Advertising, or a related field is preferred. Proven experience in managing PPC campaigns on platforms like Google Ads, Bing Ads, and social media. Strong analytical skills with the ability to interpret data and provide actionable insights. Excellent communication skills and the ability to work collaboratively in a team. Certification in Google Ads or other relevant platforms is a plus. Knowledge of Affiliate, SEO and its integration with PPC strategies is beneficial.
